descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Tahoma][color=#00ff00][size=6]Mogba

[/size][/color][/font]~Now Part of [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/78307/?]The Femme Fatale Follower Pack[/url]~


[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/bvw7202yv/20160803190051_1.jpg[/img]
[font=Tahoma]
[/font][font=Tahoma]Name:  Mogba
Race:  Orc
Location:  Riften (Bee & Barb)
Voice:  Female Orc
Marriageable:  Yes
Weight:  80
Body:  Custom UUNP (HDT & Non-HDT)
Skin:  Fair Skin

Armor:  Remodeled Armor (ChronoTrigger77 & gamefever)
Armor:  Vanilla Orchish Stronghold Outfit (Non-HDT Version)

Weapons:  Orc with Orcish Weapon Set Replacer

ENB:  RealVision
Tested with AFT & EFF

Skill bonuses to Block, Armor, Two-Handed.  Healing Spell.  Orc Bonuses/Traits.[/font]

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/3ro2x9gjr/20160803175115_1.jpg[/img]

[font=Tahoma][color=#00ff00][size=4]REQUIREMENTS:
[/size][/color]
[u][b]HDT Version[/b][/u]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68000/?]XPMSE[/url] (Armor)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/?]HDT[/url] (Armor)

[u][b]Non-HDT Version[/b][/u]
Compatible Skeleton if you want bounce (ex.  XPSME)


[color=#00ff00][size=4]RECOMMENDED:[/size][/color]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11371/?]83Williows Whiter Teeth 4All (used in screenshots)[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457/?]FaceLight[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75951/?]Fix Lip Sync[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76051/?]Are You There[/url]

[color=#00ff00][size=4]INSTALLATION:[/size][/color]

Manual or your favorite Mod Manager

[color=#00ff00][size=4]UNINSTALL:[/size][/color]

Manual Removal of all Mogba files or your favorite Mod Manager

[color=#00ff00][size=4]MANY THANKS TO:[/size][/color]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76828/?]Make A Follower Kit[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/10858658/?]sfeile (testing & screenshots)[/url]
[url=https://www.facebook.com/groups/755816797880543/]Bethesda Mod Creation Collective[/url]

[color=#00ff00][size=4]CREDITS/RESOURCES/PERMISSIONS:[/size][/color]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25259/?]Remodeled Armor For CBBE Bodyslide HDT[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69562/?]Remodeled Armor for UUNP Bodyslide HDT[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60001/?]Orcish Weapon Set[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015/?]Bodyslide[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]RaceMenu[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51602/?]Fair Skin[/url]
SG Hair (Google Is Your Friend)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30411/?]Brows[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76089/?]YevMods - Makeup Pack[/url]
Bethesda (of course)

[color=#93c47d]*If I forgot anyone please kindly remind me*[/color]

[/font][img]https://s5.postimg.cc/8615mughz/20160803190552_1.jpg[/img]

[color=#00ff00][size=4]PLEASE CHECK OUT MY OTHER FOLLOWERS:
